item.title: ZZZ: A Gacha Masterpiece
item.description: The newest game release from miHoYo has proven to be the bane of my productivity, but in a good way. It has been a lengthy time since I have been as invested into a video game as I am into Zenless Zone Zero. This ‘urban fantasy ARPG’ is reminiscent of the Persona games, minus the turn-based combat sequences. I have enjoyed Persona 3 before on my old PlayStation Portable, but I have never been an avid fan of the games.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Matija Milaković. I’ve started my professional journey in the games industry in 2022, studying Game Development at the University of Skövde in Sweden. I’ve worked on a variety of projects in multiple roles, but mainly as a gameplay programmer. I also love Warhammer 40k, horror movies and games, anime and brisk walks in nature while brandishing my favorite Casio watches. Right now I am working on an FPS called Gun Samurai - a class-based competitive first-person shooter.

item.title: Projects
